Uses of Class
edu.rit.draw.item.Oval

  • Packages that use Oval 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.draw.item
    Package edu.rit.draw.item contains classes for the different kinds of drawing items that can appear in a Drawing.

    • Uses of Oval in edu.rit.draw.item

      Methods in edu.rit.draw.item that return Oval 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Oval Oval.add()
      Add this oval to the end of the default drawing's sequence of drawing items.
      Oval Oval.add(Drawing theDrawing)
      Add this oval to the end of the given drawing's sequence of drawing items.
      Oval Oval.addFirst()
      Add this oval to the beginning of the default drawing's sequence of drawing items.
      Oval Oval.addFirst(Drawing theDrawing)
      Add this oval to the beginning of the given drawing's sequence of drawing items.
